website_summaries.verdict: If you like spice but are concerned about preservatives, this jerky is a winner.
pros: The spice level on this jerky is pretty high, but not so high you cannot eat it
This brand has several hot flavors to choose from
cons: You do not get a large amount for the price

customer_reviews.title: the hottest beef jerky that tastes great! I can take the heat pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the hottest beef jerky that tastes great! I can take the heat pretty well, and this takes it over the top. Finally a true spicy beef jerky! I can normally eat this size package in an hour, and this is taking me like a week to eat! One small piece at a time is enough. I’m having fun at the office seeing everyone run to get water after tasting this. I’ll be buying more after this runs out!

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, the spice is nice
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, the spice is nice. My only problem is the quantity to cost ratio, but the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown Jr.

customer_reviews.title: if you don't like extremely hot spicy foods
customer_reviews.text: Warning: if you don't like extremely hot spicy foods, this is NOT for you. I bought this with a bunch of other jerkys because I like jerky. But I am not big into hot foods. This is easily the hottest thing I've ever consumed, and it was gaggingly painful for a solid 15 minutes after eating a full piece. I gave this 5 stars because the meat is of high quality, not too much stringiness or excess fat. I know this is perfect for someone who actually appreciates heat (unlike me). I'm sure hotter jerky exists but I don't want to experience the nightmares that follow it, so this will end my journey to the top of the spice rack.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: 100% delicious, not much quantity for $8
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jerky, it's delicious. The texture, moisture and flavor are all about perfect. That being said this is a really small pack for $8. My photos show the largest of 3 total pieces included in one pack. My recommendation would be to try it at least once and then decide for yourself if the taste is worth the price. I got 3 packs for $24 or whatever and I could easily smash this all in one sitting. I went with the "seriously spicy" flavor which was spot on for heat and about in the middle of the pack for what they offer. FYI I eat everything spicy, if u don't I'd go with a milder option.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome B.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch jerky!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! searched just about every jerky on amazon and came down to these "half heat". They are awesome, not too dry, not too wet, perfect medium spicy, and you can chew them fairly easy. They come in a resealable bag also which is nice. They also threw in a sample pack of pineapple jerky! Thanks! Will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: G S

customer_reviews.title: I'm a hot head, loved this jerky
customer_reviews.text: Was given a bag by a coworker because he couldnt handle Katie's mellower stuff. I loved it enough I bought some more. This jerky is where Im at with spicy food right now, its enough I can handle it but too much will smoke me out. I would say this is not for the faint of heart, I add a homebrew hot pepper powder consisting of 1/2 cayenne,seranno and 1/2ghost,scorpion to a majority of my food and this jerky is still hot.
customer_reviews.author: TSi

customer_reviews.title: Very HOT
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars because the product itself is great. I did order the Scorpion XXX for my boyfriend thinking that it wouldn't even phase him. My boyfriend is not sensitive to hot things and eats them on a regular basis. He loves hot sauce so much, that he puts it on almost everything he eats. When he tried this Jerky, he was very uncomfortable and it definitely got to him. He was very uncomfortable and almost sick for a few days after eating it. I am not sure if it really mentions in the description how hot this really is and that is why I am writing this review. Just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: This jerky will kick your ass!
customer_reviews.text: If you're not used to spicy food, beware. The first bite is extremely deceiving, you taste the jerky and feel a slight tingle on your lips and tongue. Seconds later your entire mouth and throat are on fire. You will soon feel it in your sinuses, and you will feel it make a path through your body. I've had Carolina Reaper wings at a wing challenge in Statesville NC, and while this jerky isn't as hot as those wings were, it will still wreak havoc on your senses. Make sure you have milk handy, DO NOT DRINK WATER WITH IT! I highly recommend this jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Kinda spicy...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the spiciest beef jerky I can find and so far this was the spiciest. Still wasnt spicy enough tho. I gave it a 4star bcuz it was actually spicy just as advertised. The taste for me is too bland unfortunately. I've found better tasting jerky tho they were not comparable in spice level. If u guys have any other flavors u would like me to try just email me( I'll pay for it of course) . I'm always lookin for the spiciest foods so if u have new products I would love to know about them. Overall it was I'd say 3.5/5. Texture was great 5/5. Spice was 3.7/5. Taste I'd say almost 3/5.
customer_reviews.author: Savath Khun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, fairly spicy, good texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Best of the three I tried on an Amazon beef jerky taste test I conducted. I'd call it a moderate level of heat, but I do like stuff pretty hot. Texture, size, cut, and flavor was by far the best over "The New Primal" and "Biltong" brand of jerkys. Those were not to my satisfaction at all. Still I was let down on my entire taste test because I had used prior customer reviews to buy the three brands I had purchased, and none of them were better than the "Old Trapper" jerky I regularly get from Sportsmans Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Hot Hot Hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bag of your XXX scorpion jerky, for my entertainment not for my own personal consumption, I work with a bunch of guys who love hot stuff, and this did not disappoint! They all enjoyed the jerky's flavor, once swallowed it begins to ramp up the heat to impressive levels. Great product, only complaint would be the amount you get for your money, but hey most people can't eat much of it in one sitting anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Extra, extra hot, but hardly any product in package
customer_reviews.text: I typically love spicy beef jerky, so I thought I would give this a try. It was WAY spicier than I had anticipated, so I actually threw most of it away. That is not my reason for a mediocre review - the taste was amazing, and nice and fresh. If I loved super spicy jerky, this would be it. However, for the cost, go elsewhere. There were only two strips (granted they were larger strips), but only two for the cost I paid. I’ll find another brand with same taste and better value.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: When you need hot, but really hot!
customer_reviews.text: I was craving some hot jerky and let me tell you this hits the spot. I tried a few others that were ghost pepper or stated they were insanely hot but they also tasted gummy and there was a sweetness that came through I didn’t care for. Not this brand. This was perfect and very dry like I like my jerky. Sometimes and nickel sized piece was enough. I had to learn to eat this in smaller doses because I overdid it once and my stomach couldn’t handle it. Great immediate and slow build heat on this one.
customer_reviews.author: LJW

customer_reviews.title: Say yes to delicious pain!
customer_reviews.text: Wanna keep people away from your jerky? Wanna see someone cry? Do you like eating actual fire? This is the one for you! I absolutely love scorpion peppers AND beef jerky so the purchase was an obvious yes from me. The flavor is amazing, smoky semi-sweet delicious pain. The amount you get is a bit small for the price - but hey that's ALL beef jerky anymore. #BoycottJerkyPrices anyone? Lol... Seriously happy with my purchase, great jerky, give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Scorpion Heat
customer_reviews.text: I love hot an spicy, the XXX scorpion Beef jerky is that.. A small piece goes a long ways.. If anyone like the heat of a Scorpion, this one you'll like.. I would buy it again, I just wish it had 6 pieces instead of 2.. Do you have any other flavors, other beef jerky with Scotch Bonnets, or 7 pots? How a Extreme Orange beef - like Orange chicken, but with Scorpion Peppers.. It might be something new, tasty good..
customer_reviews.author: Warren Weeks

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!  NOT EDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I took two small bites of this jerky and it was so hot that I could not eat it. I ended up spitting it out. Furthermore, it has a distinct taste of the chemicals from the plastic wrapping. It gave me a stomach ache that I still have this morning. DO NOT BUY. This company will not take back unopened packs so I lost 50 bucks. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT YOU WILL BE SORRY!
customer_reviews.author: Barb C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, high heat level.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of beef jerky, and good jerky is hard to find. Even harder to find is good jerky that packs heat. This Katie’s XXX Scorpion delivers on both ends. When taking the first bite, the first thing I noticed was the delicious flavor and real jerky texture, then comes the heat! This jerky is perfect for pepper heads like me. The best thing is even with the high heat level, it is extremely tasty, such good flavor. This is a high quality product. And the pineapple jerky is a delicious fruit snack as well.
customer_reviews.author: MAW

customer_reviews.title: 2.3 ounce per pack is a joke!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ghost Pepper three pack and it was delicious jerky, not as hot as I would have thought, but my biggest complaint is how little you get per pack. 2.3 ounces per pack, comes out to about $9.32 per pack if you buy the 3 pack. It's great jerky, but $27.97 for 3, 2.3 ounce packs is highway robbery! It's too bad because I really liked this jerky.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Satan was involved!
customer_reviews.text: This beef jerky is pretty much foreskin off of Satans' di** that just comes off instantly as jerky and it just keeps going and going. Then you feel so bad for liking it because the thought is so wrong but, yet it tastes so good, then its hotter than hell for like 10 to 20 minutes and once it cools off you just want more! It hurts so good and tastes just right.
customer_reviews.author: N. Greco

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor but very dry and tough. Wish it had a little bit of tenderness.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this jerky on a whim. This jerky was a very dry type of jerky. Not my favorite. It was lacking tenderness and moisture. Flavor was great but was very hard to break down. If you love super dry spicy jerky and chewing on it for a while, then this is the one for you. It’s got great flavor but felt like chewing on leather. Unfortunately it wasn’t my ideal jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Spicy and tasty but powdery
customer_reviews.text: I think the headline summed it up nicely. I could definitely taste the sweetness in the beef jerky, had a good flavor,... definitely spicy, but powdery... there was a lot of scorpion powder on each one... so if you like powder, you will like these. Sometimes it was so much you put it in your mouth and the powder goes up your nose. But that is fine. Still tasted like natural heat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: HOT HOT HOT, but great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I personally love eating foods most people make YouTube challenges out of, and this is no different. It is VERY hot to someone not accustomed to spicy foods, and hot even to us who pride ourselves on our cast-iron tastebuds. Little tougher than some hot jerky Ive had, but really that is a personal preference because it seems to last much longer than "super tender" jerky. Try their reaper blend too if you like this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cubby

customer_reviews.title: Variety Pack - Crazy spicy, full of flavor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic beef jerky! Extremely spicy once you get to Carolina Reaper and up. However, having tasted all peppers organically (habenaro, ghost, reaper, scorpion), it is clear that the actual peppers were used to spice and flavor the jerky, not just flavoring. Habenaro is great for all day snacking, but I would reserve the ghost through xxx scorpion for special occasions. Pros: Crazy spicy, very flavorful, natural, low sugar, good texture. Cons: Crazy spicy, so not the best snack. I recommend the habenero for an all-day snack, and reserve the ghost and up for spicy occasions. Thin jerky, which is normal for natural dried meats, but something to note.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some stringy meat. Good spice level. Decent Flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I would buy again for the price but it had a nice heat level to it. It's pretty hot but not insanely hot. It will make you a little warm. Decent amonut of stringy meat in this one that I was unable to chew. I bought this and the bourbon cherry as well as spicy garlic and have reviewed each of them.
customer_reviews.author: reeeeeviewer

customer_reviews.title: Gut wrencher!
customer_reviews.text: Oooh boy, this jerky has some very good flavor and some slow-burning heat - but beware! It will cause you some serious gastric discomfort! I was kind enough to share the jerky with my fellow co-workers, and we all agreed the flavor was really good and it had plenty of heat - butwe ALL suffered some serious gastric issues from immediately after digestion to 48 hours after eating. The gastic issues ranged from bad gut ache to burning ass-plosions. Eat at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: AK 5-0

customer_reviews.title: Good and spicy, but you do not receive much of the product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was very tasty, and was very spicy as was expected. Wish that there was more than one piece in the bag however. The amount of product you actually receive is quite small for the price paid. Though it was very good, I would not purchase again due to this.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: So freaking hot!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this delivered to my house today so me being a normal person who eats jalapenos and Habaneros and ghost peppers and all that all the time I think to myself okay what does Carolina Reaper do? This thing will set you on fire. That's all I have to say. 😵
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mazon

customer_reviews.title: Very spicy jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the spiciest beef jerky that Ive ever had. I started at the lower levels like 'seriously spicy' and worked my way up. All had great flavor...This one just has so much heat that the actual flavor gets covered up. But if you enjoy the burn then this is the one. My favorite was the 7 Pot Primo.
customer_reviews.author: KSD

customer_reviews.title: worth  a try
customer_reviews.text: has a nice smell and flavor which is the only reason i ate it all. it is definitely hot but not as hot as i was hoping for. the heat that this provides is not an enjoyable one because of how it hits the back of your throat. i was reluctant to swallow each bite because of this but the flavor was good enough that i did anyway. it was dry an tough but not too dry or tough as far as jerky goes.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Horrible flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is just bad all the way around. 1 star isnt even worthy for it. First the flavor is just bad and there isn't much of it anyways. The price is just ridiculous, $10 for 4 pieces. Now for the spice, yes it's hot as expected. No complaint there. I wont ever purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Jerky, Awesome Flavors!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only tried two flavors: Ghost Pepper and XXX hot. I got the 6-pack for a birthday gift. Kinda pricey but really awesome. Quality meat and excellent flavor...meaning not just heat but taste too. These are real jerky pieces, not "compressed" meat jerky...these are tough (like real jerky should be) but cut correctly so they pull apart. You have to really chew them, so you get the full flavor/heat experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lowcountry LawMan

customer_reviews.title: HOT AS HECK!!! But delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality Jerky. I make my own which I feel is supreme but this rivals my own. The reason I tried this was the Carolina reaper heat. I can’t find a good quality powder for my own so I tried this. ITS AMAZING!! Buyer beware....this stuff is very very hot. It brings out the true flavor of Carolina Reaper but it is very very hot!
customer_reviews.author: Chelpiper

customer_reviews.title: Silly hot, but has it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Yep, thats hot. I love spicy food and I have had reaper jerky before, but this still shocks the senses. The flavor is good, but the heat is incredibly intense (as it should be at over 2 million scoville). Definitely not for those that are hungry, but a great snack to take a single bite of then forget anything you were craving. Chocolate, tobacco, sweets, etc will all be forgotten once you eat this because your face goes numb and you salivate like a rabid dog.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: You better like hot stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Heat level was almost perfect. It was hot enough to get your attention and leave a little sting in the throat, but didn't demand a drink to follow up. Flavor was good, but the aroma was strange, almost a puff of gasoline upon opening the package. Everyone who sampled agreed : good flavor, good heat. Nobody I know cares about gluten.
customer_reviews.author: Foob

customer_reviews.title: He said he liked it but then after finishing the half he can't ...
customer_reviews.text: We did the Beef Jerky Spicy challenge and it was sooooooo spicy! I spit it out right away. My husband was able to eat it. He said he liked it but then after finishing the half he can't eat it anymore because it was so spicy. After that he was not able to contain it he threw up. The beef jerky has a good taste though. It was fun!
customer_reviews.author: cowmi

customer_reviews.title: Not for woosies
customer_reviews.text: This jerky is NOT for the faint of heart! Only a real heat seeker will appreciate the hotness,lol. It doesn't come with a lot in the package but I could only take a few bites in one sitting so I'm sure it will last me a few weeks. I will be purchasing more as well as some of the other flavors. It arrived fast also
customer_reviews.author: peggyb

customer_reviews.title: If you like crazy hot go for it
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely hot. It actually gave me an upset stomach and made my heart race. I will not buy again because it was just over the top hot. I gave 5 stars because it is as advertised and was what I ordered. If you like crazy hot go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Tough and HOTTTTTT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the dry and very thin texture. It also felt a bit greasy in the hand. Once I chewed it up though, that tough jerky was infuse with some serious heat. Really, really hot for me. Not recommended for most. Not a great value for money. It was a very small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Epton

customer_reviews.title: 7 pot is pretty hot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good jerky. It's definitely spicy, not crazy though. If the jerky with chili flakes is to much for you DO NOT get this. However if your not satisfied with the spice level of the typical spicy jerky readily available to you. Katie's got it on lock. I have both scorpion and scorpion xxx still to try. I'm very happy with the 7 pot though, and am excited to try the 2 hotter options I mentioned above. Order arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I have bought these for each other’s birthday, just to destroy our colons. The flavor is great if you like hell fire and brimstone in chunks of meat ( and who doesn’t). Awesome product, we will continue to try to hurt each other the only way we can, with spicy, spicy meat. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MM42

customer_reviews.title: Hottest beef jerky I’ve had, good quality, but use with caution.
customer_reviews.text: It’s probably one of the hottest jerkies you will find on the market, unlike other brands what blend sugar in the jerky, this doesn’t, so you get heated up really easily, really fast. It’s hard, fresh jerky packed with heat, so if you like something of this nature, this would be a nice snack that lasts you for a while; however, if you are more into similar jerkies that packed with sweetness and spiciness and softer, this may not be the best option. Your pick!
customer_reviews.author: Zeegna

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves extremely hot foods so I ordered this for him and he absolutely loved it and shared it with some of our camping friends and they absolutely loved it. They said the flavor was great, my husband didn't think it was too hot but then a different piece was much hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Northam

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting beff jerky ever!
customer_reviews.text: My fault for ordering every flavor, but it tasted awful. I am a beef jerky fan and most of jerkies are about the same depending on flavor of course, but this brand I am trying for the first time, wow,,,,,,,,,,,, I spit it out. Thought I could return the rest, but I cannot.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, not great jerky-to-dollar ratio
customer_reviews.text: It's tasty jerky - no sane jerky eater could deny that. The jerky-to-dollar ratio, though, is meager. Premium products cost more money. Nothing mysterious there. But this jerky is $60+ a pound. (I know, I know, jerky is dry and doesn't have the benefit of water weight.) If I spend $60 a pound on meat, I just want it to be dry aged..or still swimming..or..actively endangered -- really anything but jerky. You can't have it all. Sure. But you can want more jerky.
customer_reviews.author: karl y.

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not especially spicy, though.
customer_reviews.text: I'm perfectly happy with this jerky. It was firm, well made, great flavor. The only downside would be if you are looking for serious heat you won't find it here. Sure, it's spicy, but it's not "holy crap where's the milk?" spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: hot torture
customer_reviews.text: if your looking for something to make you cry in glorious agony and breathing fire like a dragon look no further this. it was the best tasting extremely hot jerky i have ever had i looved every horrible bit lol if your like me and are addicted to everything hot and a glutton for punishment you too will enjoy this jerky.....but if thats not you and you just want to get one over on a coworker, or pull a joke on a friend.....well this could work for you too......give it a try either way you spin it you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Spicy, delicious, but small portions
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a freak when it comes to spicy food. He adds Carolina Reaper, Scorpion Pepper and Ghost Pepper flakes/sauces to everything he eats and is usually pretty disappointed by "spicy" snacks. However, these got a cough or two from him! He very much enjoyed it, which makes me a happy girl. My only complaint is the amount per bag. More of a sampler portion for a full dish price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love beef jerky and couldn’t wait to try this ghost pepper flavored jerky. So far, ghost pepper has not been too spicy for me. People can’t believe that I don’t find it spicy so they keep challenging me to try ghost pepper. This was tasty jerky and would highly recommend. Would love to try some other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very spicy stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My sister asked me for hot beef jerky for her birthday. She got this variety pack of hot jerky. Then she calls me to tell me that I am trying to kill her. She said that it's too spicy to eat. My humble opinion is that she shouldn't have asked for hot jerky if she didn't want HOT jerky. So if you are looking for really not jerky this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: RENE BRAMBLETT

customer_reviews.title: the spice of life!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! This jerky has a nice spice too it! It actually sells me some scorpion bite! I hope to see more extreme spicy jerky from you guys. Ghost pepper? Carolina reaper? I'd buy them and enjoy them regularly! Can't find this kind of spice anyehere else.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Not much to go on
customer_reviews.text: Just received and wanted to show the quantity you get per package. Hoping to surprise a few coworkers since there isn't nothing too hot for them. Hopefully this is enough to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Very good, great heat
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult for me to give 5 stars for anything, this was real tasty and great heat. I agree with others as to being a little pricy, I purchased two packets and would consider it again if there was a a discount for multiples or a larger quantity. Worth a try regardless.
customer_reviews.author: John Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Sample Size Portion
customer_reviews.text: Package came with three small and thin pieces of jerky. Pretty good flavor but very low value. Would absolutely not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful and Hot!
customer_reviews.text: This product does pack good flavor with a punch of hotness that will make you wanna eat it in small nibbles lol but it fails in presentation. It doesnt look tasty when you see it in the package. Looks dry and worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lane

customer_reviews.title: Delicious with a range of heat
customer_reviews.text: It was about what I expected. Not a lot of meat for the price, but the meat is high quality and very tasty. Each flavor was individually sealed (in a resealable bag) with its own silica packet for freshness. I was comfortable eating the jerky casually until I hit the carolina reaper. I had to eat that one and the scorpion pepper one in very small pieces. I gave up on finishing the XXX scorpion pepper after just a few bites. To call it hot is an understatement. It was pain. I ate pain. Overall very enjoyable, I may order some more -- just not the SUPER hots for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.  Really fresh, but very poor value.
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Fresh as you could want. But the value for the money is not great. With some brands you can get more product for what you pay for here. I just wanted to try it once. I would not by it again. To expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Roland C Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heat Jerky
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous for how spicy these were going to be, but was pleasantly surprised. The spice was the perfect amount, just enough where I could really feel it on my lips and tongue, but now bad enough where I was rushing to find water. The aftermath was no issue either. Only reason it isn't 5 stars is because I think the actual taste of the jerky could have been better and that there should have been another piece in the bag (comes with 4).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M

customer_reviews.title: but finding this is like stumbling on El Dorado
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of "HOT" beef jerky in the past, but finding this is like stumbling on El Dorado. Hands down the best flavor, Hottest pepper level of any that I tried before. No chemical after taste at all. The ONLY knock is that the portion is small and my initial reaction was one of disappointment when I opened it. But at the first taste, all that went away. Will definitely be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and real heat!
customer_reviews.text: I beleive this is the hottest one they offer and it is just that. I love heat and this deleivers until you get used to it small peices are enough. My favorite part is once you get past the heat the jerky has a really good flavor to it. Youll only get like 2 big peices for 10.00 dollar bag. Its in the middle of dry and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but bad value
customer_reviews.text: The jerky was fresh. I thought the taste was pretty good, but definitely not wow. Spicy as advertised. The biggest issue is the value. $10 for 3oz of jerky is a pretty bad price. I would probably order this again if the value was better. I would expect to pay $10 for about 6-8 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G.

customer_reviews.title: So spicy
customer_reviews.text: This is HOT. And I love spicy food. I usually ate a small piece of this jerky whenever I wanted a snack but didn't want all of the calories. Just a small sample when you are feeling like you want something spicy? this is the jerky for you. This is spicy but has sweetness to it so it's not just a one dimensional flavor.
customer_reviews.author: ANNAH

customer_reviews.title: spicy snack for sure
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could handle the heat from this. I was wrong. The reaper heat started the second the jerky touched my lips. had a little bit of forehead sweat going on and got hiccups pretty quickly. Milk seemed to help. This jerky is tasty, and plenty hot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It Kicks Hard
customer_reviews.text: It's Good. The texture of the jerky was perfect. I felt there could have been more in the bag since it cost me $9 but seriously, I could only eat a half of a piece at a time. So it lasted awhile. They know what they're doing here, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting jerky I have ever purchased, and it's not even close.
customer_reviews.text: This XXX Scorpion Jerky is out of this world good. I knew it was going to be great when I opened the bag and it smelled like a smokey afternoon bbq. The heat could be a little hotter for me (but I'm a spicy food maniac), but the flavor is on point. I can really taste the love that went into making this. I can't wait to try the other bag I have coming :)
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Moye

customer_reviews.title: Spicy yet flavorful unless your mouth numbs right out then the texture is just 👌
customer_reviews.text: Everything you would expect in a Carolina reaper hot jerky. The perfect punch, flavor and texture. Highly recommend for those who can take heat. Or those who just want to get it to play tricks! Would VERY much recommend to a friend. Give Katie's a try, and I don't usually EVER write reviews at all. And no I'm nowhere near paid to say this. Wish I was!
customer_reviews.author: mikayla dubuque

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor -- amount in each bag is only 2.3oz though :(
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this stuff is awesome -- I read other reviews and they mentioned how crazy spicy it was. I would say I can tolerate heat pretty well and I think it was perfect. I am really disappointed with the amount though, there are four small pieces in each bag which is insane. I could eat all of it in like 10 minutes at most (2.3 oz to each bag.) I get that you are paying a premium for better quality and flavor but not sure the ounces that come in a single bag would / could offset the cost for me. No one would describe me as frugal so this is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Wowzas!  This is out of this world spicy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for some friends at work who love spicy foods and challenge each other to see who can eat the most spicy things. This was even too spicy for them and had them screaming for water. I enjoyed since it was more of a food challenge but seriously should heed the warning as this is amazingly spicy. They did say the flavor was some of the best jerky they’ve had as well though. Be prepared and take small bites (and possibly have your camera ready to record reactions)! A must if you have a daring spice lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barcio

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for taste and texture, 3 stars on price
customer_reviews.text: If this wasn't so expensive I'd order it by the truckload. Great taste, chewy but not too tough, nice heat, best tasting one I've tried so far. Just expensive so it's gotta be more of a treat rather than a daily snack...
customer_reviews.author: Bolo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, barely hot
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that like most people, I bought this because it's supposed to be flavored with carolina reaper peppers. If this is true, I can't imagine how. The jerky honestly was barely even hot. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: True hotness
customer_reviews.text: I must say, the flavor and hotness of the xxx scorpion was well beyond expected. The second pack I opened had issues. I tossed it. Enough said, the first pack was awesome. Basing my review on one pack out of several.
customer_reviews.author: check the description

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The beef jerky was excellent. I enjoyed the variety and the spiciness. The jerky was soft and flavorful. It was expensive but I thought it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, smokey, heat
customer_reviews.text: This jerky is pretty hot. If your average red vinegar hot sauce is enough, this will hurt you. Behind the heat is a nice flavor. It is a bit on the sweet side for me, but there is also a nice hint of smoke as well. The burn will stick with you for a few minutes, but no issues later on. I'd highly recommend this jerky if you like heat and don't mind a sweeter jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Taste the heat AND THE MEAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dang, was this ever so delicious! My brother and I have been on this spicy quest lately. We happen to see Katie’s meats and were impressed. The Scorpion is hot, but definitely not lacking in flavor! One of the better beef jerky's I’ve tried! Will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Gams

customer_reviews.title: Son said it satisfied his craving for something hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who says nothing is hot enough. He puts Dave's Insanity on everything he eats. When he tasted this he said it was one of the hottest things he ever ate. He LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: margaret ramaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fair cost.
customer_reviews.text: Taists very good, and delivers heat that delays taking a second portion. Should appeal to any spicy food lovers, but isn't extreme enough to make it a food challenge... unless of course you would like to try a full bag. I could remove points for cost, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient loved it. Needless to say, it did not survive the day. He was very excited and pleased with the product. He just wishes it was a bigger package so it would last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jami McComb

customer_reviews.title: Love it - jerky heaven!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like spicy, and if you like the taste of beef, this is jerky heaven. Only drawback for me is that being retired, and having a limited income, i can only afford such a treat about once every couple of months. Otherwise, just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hec M.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, not super salty, and has great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The Scorpion XXX Beef Jerky was absolutely awesome! I do not recommend this to anyone who cannot handle Ghost Peppers. I ate the whole bag in one sitting and LOVED it. Paid for it later where my stomach hurt! But it tasted amazing and highly recommend. Would also recommend, even if you can eat spicy, don't eat it all in one sitting like I did. ;) Great flavor, not super salty, and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Tassie

customer_reviews.title: Really, good, seriously, spicy jerky!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the heat of this jerky. I did eat one, of the two, packages in one sitting. (Maybe 15mins.) Just saying, there is not a lot of jerky per package. That would be my only dislike. My nose was running and it was so worth it. I love spicy! I look forward to trying other flavors. I wish the price was less for so few pieces of jerky. This is a winner, for sure, for jerky lovers. Just beware of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Spicy!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best spicy jerky I've ever had and I've eaten many varieties!!! I wish I could get it in the store, totally worth it and I'll be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: IShopTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This beef jerkey was a birthday gift for my husband, he loves beef jerky and he loves spice!! Up until now I've had a hard time finding a spicy beef jerky that he actually enjoyed the flavor of.... but he loves this beef jerky it did take him a while to eat it since it's so hot but he says the flavor is delicious! I ordered it with next day shipping and it arrived right on time!! I was contacted immediately by the seller making sure I was happy with my purchase, I was very impressed with their customer service! I will be ordering more and trying new flavors! Highly highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bag - Delicious and spicy, perfect taste!
customer_reviews.text: In terms of product quality - this is some of the best jerky I've ever had in my life. Fresh, moist, tender, and best of all, perfectly seasoned and spicy. Quick note: Close your eyes as you take bites, some of the pepper dust can fly straight into them. I am used to paying huge fees for Jerky, I know it's not a cheap food. And I understand this is high-quality stuff. But maybe let your customers know that they're paying $10 for literally 3 pieces of jerky? This is more of a sampler bag than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Scorpion XXX - Marketed Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I love to hurt some with spicy foods and I eat a lot of it. So I figured I'd give the Scorpion XXX a try...it's hot. Uncomfortably so. But, I'm definitely eating it all...just little by little now. Thank you for making your jerky as it's marketed as! Going to buy more of another kind to try out!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Really spicy, Little flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gf since shes gluten free but hates anything hot so it was a fun purchase. I dont think she likes me much after having her eat some of this.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Spicy but good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend and got to try a piece. I thought it tasted Good so did my friend. I think he ate too much though at once bc it wound up hurting his stomach. Spicy but enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had!
customer_reviews.text: My son lives out of state and had a birthday last week. I was looking for something to send him from amazon and remembered how much he likes beef jerky. Since I was unfamiliar with all the options available, I ordered several packages of jerky from 3 different suppliers. He has called to tell me that this Habanero Peppered Jerky was the best he has ever had and he has had many different variety's. So I am giving this a 5 star on his recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: kmiranda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff period! I'm always looking for spicy beef jerky because in stores near me their hot jerky is never hot enough, but Katie's delivered on it. I ordered the seven pot primo and was pleased with it and they also threw in a free pack of pinapple jerky which I've never had before but my girlfriend enjoyed it. I am gonna try the next one down in heat wise from the 7 pot next time I order. But overall 5 star and definitely a must order from Katie's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting and hottest jerky ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is top-of-the-line hot-and-spicy-jerky! Several of us at the office tried it. We have a very high tolerance for hot peppers - and this lit us up! The taste is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Good quality beef, no hard to chew pieces. This was actually spicy unlike some other products claiming to be spicy ive purchased before. If you’re into a lot of spice and love beef jerky this is definitely for you!! It is slightly expensive for the size you’re getting, but personally the quality of the meat makes it worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Must have got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I'm a jerky fan, but I'm afraid I did not care for this jerky. The package boasts "incredibly tender!", but in fact the jerky was extremely dry, hard and tough. It also had not much flavor other than salt, followed by a rather yucky aftertaste. I wonder if it's possible I somehow got a bad batch? There was an enclosed sample of "pineapple jerky" that was delicious so it seems some of the products are good. But the batch of jerky I got wasn't good at all.
customer_reviews.author: JMom

customer_reviews.title: Some of Best Jerky I Had
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best jerky I have had, I usually just get the typical stuff from target or CVS however this was just better texture, feel, and taste overall. It isn't too spicy however it definitely gives some of the kick of habanero. This is from someone who normally doesn't eat spicy foods yet I was able to easily eat this whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Freaking hot and good all in one will definitely be getting more wish it came with more in the pack for the money. That part was kind of off a little.
customer_reviews.author: bbigb

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Loving the scorpion jerky. I bought it to share with coworkers because we'll test our mettle on hot stuff especially jerky. The scorpion far surpassed our recent tastings of Carolina reaper jerky. The heat starts out slow and then builds and builds. Lasting quite awhile. Does not disappoint. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Heat is not as Hot
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be super hot. After eating half the bag, I only sweated a few times but that was from sitting too close to the heater. But this jerky was delicious and would recommend to others who's willing to spice up their day.
customer_reviews.author: FireballMushRoomTail

customer_reviews.title: Kick @$$
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a beef jerky eating connoisseur and this ghost pepper'd is his favorite of all time by far!!! He eats some every morning at work and says it gives him the kick in the @$$ he needs, a wake me up, if you will. He always takes some on our hikes for refreshment and I love it because it is the healthiest and most flavorful brand I could find - unique exceptional flavor!!! We are true fans!! THANK YOU!!! K&K Colburn, Salisbury NH
customer_reviews.author: Karen Colburn-Auntie

customer_reviews.title: I heard the Carolina Reaper Spicy Beef Jerky is the best and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to research the hottest peppers ever and so I ordered the Carolina Reaper Spicy Beef Jerky and sauce when I heard on the news that this was it. So I ordered Xmas gift for my neighbors ! They always try new menus and try to get it as hot as beyond ... especially they also love smokin' and barbecue parties. Can't wait to see their expressions for their gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Gulino

customer_reviews.title: just simply hot
customer_reviews.text: This has way more heat than it has flavor. I love spicy stuff, but I want a base flavor that is enjoyable to start with, not just bury it with heat.
customer_reviews.author: D Mars 23

customer_reviews.title: Like it says, it’s hot.
customer_reviews.text: The outtake was something I don’t want to happen again
customer_reviews.author: Donald wyckoff

customer_reviews.title: Delicious gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great! My husband loves spicy foods and I got this as a stocking stuffer. He is a tough jerky critic and said that this was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Hottest jerky I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the hottest jerky I've found. It's a satisfying amount of heat, but still I think I would have enjoyed a bit more. The texture is fairly tough and dry. The flavor isn't strong enough to cut through the heat very well but it's pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

product_meta.title: Carolina Reaper Spicy Beef Jerky-GLUTEN FREE - No Preservatives, Nitrites, or MSG
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Carolina Reaper| Size:1.8 Ounce (Pack of 1)WHAT MAKES KATIE’S JERKY THE BEST? Do you LOVE homemade jerky & are disappointed when you take a chance on something you found at the gas station? I have not changed my recipe, quality standards, or process from the way I started making jerky 25 years ago! WHAT MAKES OUR PROCESS DIFFERENT? Many things, but one is that WE TAKE OUR TIME. We trim & slice the meat & soak it in the marinade RIGHT AWAY, & that’s where it STAYS for DAYS! Then we put it in the dehydrator & have our experienced jerky experts watch over it until each & every piece has been hand selected, ready to be packaged. WHY DO WE PACKAGE IT THE WAY WE DO? Vacuum packaging removes all of the air from the bag & keeps it fresher. This way we don’t have to add artificial preservatives! It’s the perfect snack. Take a few bites, zip up the bag, & stash it! The protein will help you feel full & the low fat & calories makes it guilt free! WHAT ABOUT OUR MEAT? The meat we use is always high quality! The fat is trimmed so our jerky is minimum 97% fat free. It’s the same quality meat you would be proud to serve to your family & friends! It’s cut with precision so that the slices are consistent, not too thick & not too thin. This allows the jerky to be perfectly tender with the right amount of moisture to hold in the natural meat flavor amidst all of the other seasonings. WANT TO KNOW HOW KATIE’S JERKY HANDLES FLAVORS? BIG! The first flavor you will ALWAYS get is MEAT! After that, it’s whatever the package says, & a LOT of it! Our recipes are honed to perfection, & when you find the perfect flavor for you, the challenge will be trying to make it last! Why fight it? Multiple Flavors Available. SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you are not completely satisfied, we will REPLACE or refund your order. Customer service is our top priority! WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? ADD THIS TO YOUR CART NOW!
feature_bullets: Carolina Reaper holds the Guiness Book of World Records as the hottest pepper in the world!!!
All natural beef jerky made with whole muscle, 100% USDA Choice Beef, High Quality, GLUTEN FREE
40+ Awards & counting - Scovie, Golden Chile, LA World, Hot Pepper Awards, ChilePepper Magazine...
More Options! - Beef, Bison, Elk, Venison, & Pineapple, 30+ Flavors! - Click on the Brand Link above
Single Pack - Also avail in 3 or 6 packs = buy more & SAVE & get FREE SAMPLE
